text: The Women's individual pursuit competition at the 2017 World Championships was held on 15 April 2017.ScheduleStart list ==Results== ===Qualifying=== The first two racers raced for gold, the third and fourth fastest rider raced for the bronze medal.Qualifying results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" |- !
